arm_group.description: Chronic Heart Failure  patients older than 65 years, which accept to participate to the study and give their informed written consent and consecutively refer to the A.R.C.A Campania Cardiologists in the pertaining healthcare districts.

brief_summary.textblock:
ALERT-HF is an observational study aimed to evaluate the diagnostic criteria adopted and the
      adherence to the current therapeutic guidelines in a large series of patients affected with
      chronic heart failure. Secondary objective is to evaluate the prevalence of chronic heart
      failure among all the patients referring to the ambulatory cardiologists of the healthcare
      district.

clinical_study.brief_title: ALERT-HF: Adherence to Guidelines in the Treatment of Patients With Chronic Heart Failure

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Diagnosis of Heart Failure

          -  Signature of informed consent

          -  Age older than 65 years

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  indication for cardiac surgery or cardiac surgery by less than 3 months

          -  age less than 65 years

          -  inability to perform periodic checks

          -  presence of malignant neoplasms and other severe diseases.

study_pop.textblock:
Chronic Heart Failure patients older than 65 years, consecutively referred to the A.R.C.A
        Campania Cardiologists in the pertaining healthcare districts

clinical_study.official_title: ALERT-HF:Adherence to Guidelines in the Treatment of Patients With Chronic Heart Failure

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients treated with each of the following indicators of adherence to the current therapeutic guidelines:-ACEI -ARB -beta blockers -loop diuretics -aldosterone antagonists -digoxin -anticoagulant therapy  - implantation of cardiac devices
primary_outcome.time_frame: first physical examination and clinical evaluation performed during a 3 months period, from November 2012 to January 2013

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: evaluate the prevalence of chronic heart failure among all the patients referring to the ambulatory cardiologists of the healthcare district

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Cross-Sectional
